what_is.title: What is "Draw, AI Guess"?
content: "Draw, AI Guess" is an innovative drawing challenge platform that combines AI image recognition with fun game mechanics.
Whether you are a beginner or an experienced artist, you can enjoy the platform and improve your skills through AI feedback and challenging levels!
The game features two types of challenges: Drawing Levels (drawing based on system-provided keywords) and Guessing Levels (free creation for AI recognition).

üéØ Drawing Levels: The system provides carefully designed keywords, progressing from simple to complex. Create images on the canvas using your brush, and let AI verify your drawing skills. Successfully complete each level to unlock the next challenge!

üé® Guessing Levels: Unleash your creativity! Input any word or phrase you want to draw, create freely, and let AI guess your artwork. There are no standard answers here - AI will provide multiple possible recognition results, sparking your artistic inspiration.

disclaimer.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer
content: When you configure custom third-party AI services (such as Baidu AI Studio, ModelScope, HuggingFace, etc.), this game only provides the gaming platform and gameplay design.

At this time, you need to obtain Access Tokens from the respective service platforms yourself and fill in and manage them on the game configuration page. The game serves solely as an interface channel for calling third-party APIs you have custom configured, and does not engage in any secondary resale or proxy of your configured AI services.

Therefore, the game does not involve any transfer of rights and obligations with third-party service providers, nor does it create any commercial relationships or infringement issues from linking their services.
